*** Now it is also possible to watch the videos online without having to download them! ***
- We added a new playback mode: the streaming mode. Don’t worry, you can still download your videos.

Thanks for updating PlayKids! In this new update, we are launching a new game where children can practice their creativity and develop their spatial awareness.
In this game, different types of blocks can be used to assemble 3D structures in an open wor

感谢您更新PlayKids！在本次更新中，我们发布了一个新游戏，可供孩子实践他们的创造力，并且开发他们的空间意识。
在这个游戏中，可用不同类型的模块在开放世界中构建3D建筑。孩子们可以建房子、桥梁、山峰以及他们能够想到的任何东西！
如果您有任何其他问题，请联系通过https://support.playkids.com联系我们；我们将乐于为您提供帮助！

感谢您更新PlayKids！在本次更新中，我们为您带来以下新特性：以更轻松的方式下载视频，以便于离线观看！每个已保存的视频都可在没有英特网连接的情况下观看，并且将储存在"我的下载" 文件夹中。
如果您有其他问题，请随时联系我们：https://support.playkids.com；我们将很高兴为您提供帮助。

Thanks for updating PlayKids!

The beloved game Voxel has returned!
Craft your world using blocks and play with the included maps, or have a relaxing time coloring 3D models.

We've added new drawing images to paint and to have fun! Encoura

Thanks for updating PlayKids!

News on Games' car: We've added new drawing images to paint and to have fun! Encourage your little artist to improve motor and cognitive skills!

Brand new puzzles for your fun!

Thanks for updating PlayKids!

It’s now easier to manage the storage occupied by the app on your device: you will be notified when your device is running out of storage, in addition to being able to track or cancel downloads in the Settings!
